# authorDisplayName

**Instance Property**

App defined display name for the playlist.

## Declaration

```swift
var authorDisplayName: String! { get set }
```

## Discussion

The system requires this property for 3rd party apps. Defaults to the app display name when not defined.

## Metadata for a playlist

- **descriptionText**: The descriptive text for the playlist.
- **name**: The playlist’s displayed name.

items.description: The descriptive text for the playlist.
